thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 33 of 1821
thread.title: bg

author: bg
title: bg
text:
I made two transfers last week. The second one was much easier and quicker because an app popped up that connected to my internet banking facility (developed by Australia Post). I appreciated the updates via email at the various stages of the transaction.
I was notified, however, by the recipient of the second transaction that what arrived was .40 euros short of what was transferred. This has not caused any problems, however, something for you to note.
